name: Mantle of the Pale Ox
modifiers: (16% to 24%) of Damage Redirected to your Highest Health MinionNo more than 75% of damage can be redirected in total. A minion can have any amount of damage redirected to it, even if it would leave it below 0 health. This stat has no effect while you have no minions. Downed and undamageable minions are ignored.
(12 to 18)% increased Health for you and your Minions
+(1 to 2) to Level of Minion Strength Skills
lore: Fight with the strength of an ox and the wisdom of a spirit
